GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
drm/meson: Fix refcount bugs in meson_vpu_has_available_connectors()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit d58ef256781398ad115aef44de0a02ad27ea6c3a, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit bbbe775ec5b5dace43a35886da9924837da09ddd. For more details please see the references link.
